content: Investments Seedly Asked by AnonymousAsked on 08 May 2019Will Seedly allow addition of CDP accounts for tracking? 1 answerAnswerBump2
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Kenneth Lou, Co-founder at SeedlyLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 08 May 2019Hi there Anon! As of now, we toyed with this idea, but decided against it.Your CDP can only be accessed via your SingPass login which is not ideal for us to access it through te Seedly app.What you can do however, is to manually add your transactions for your stocks, and create it under the 'investments' category.It should look something like this! 0 comments0
